bronx.title: Renovated SEC 8 1BED apartments AVAILABLE in a good area of the Bronx
bronx.description:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
**NO BROKER'S FEE** NO BROKER INQUIRES PLEASE



CLEAN, QUIET AND DESIRABLE APARTMENT BUILDING IN NORWOOD SECTION OF THE BRONX NEAR MONTEFIORE HOSPITAL.



BEAUTIFUL 2-BEDROOM APARTMENT IDEAL FOR ROOMMATES (Only $1,150 per Roommate), MEDICAL RESIDENT, MEDICAL FELLOWS, NURSES AND HOSPITAL STAFF




OVERVIEW:
No Broker's Fee (Management Direct)
Excellent Maintained Pre-War Building with Quiet and Respectful Tenants
Tree-lined Streets
Walkable to Subway - #4 and #D Train Lines
Walkable to Metro-North Harlem Line
Walkable to Shops and Restaurants - 2 Blocks Away  
30 Minute Train Ride to Grand Central Station in Manhattan
Convenient to Montefiore Hospital, North Central Bronx Hospital, Jacobi Hospital, St. Barnabas Hospital, Bronx Lebanon Hospital, Bronx Care
Convenient Housing for Medical Residents, Nurses, Fellows and Hospital Staff
Free Street Parking
Third Party Garage Parking Available in Neighborhood
Cats are Ok. Dogs Are NOT Allowed


INCOME REQUIREMENTS:


Minimum Combined Household Income, 50x Monthly Rent to Qualify ($115,000)
Must Have Good Credit Rating
Criminal Background Check Performed
$20 Application Fee for each Adult


REQUIRED MOVE-IN FUNDS:


First Month's Rent
One Month Security Deposit (Equal to Monthly Rent)


BUILDING AND UNIT AMENITIES:


Renovated 2-Bedroom Apartment
Stainless-Steel Appliances
Ideal Apartment for Roommates looking to Split Rent AND SAVE MONEY
Very Affordable. Only $1,150 per Roommate
Strictly Managed like a Co-op
Hardwood Floors
Tenant Laundry Facility Located on Building Premises
4K Security Camera System throughout Building
Secured Building Lobby Door
Building Intercom System
Tenant Bicycle Parking on Premises
Stove
Oven
Refrigerator
Freezer
Live-in Superintendent on Premises 
Tenant Portal for Online Rent Payments and Maintenance Requests 
Heat and Water Included in Rent
Electricity and Cooking Gas are the Tenant's Responsibility (Con Edison)
Apartment Wired for Verizon FIOS and Optimum for Cable TV and Internet








MUST ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS BELOW TO PROCEED


Full Name:

Contact Number:

Work/Profession:

Combined Annual Gross Income:

brooklyn.description:

*Please read the entire description*

Text for a video tour / how to apply 

If after reading the description and you would like to view/apply to this unit, please TEXT Corey at 631-830-5849 - any calls regarding this unit will not be answered. 

INCOME RESTRICTED / RENT STABILIZED UNIT!!


1 Bedroom $2478.25 

           1  person $82,694 - $147,420


  *   Assets:
                *   The asset limitation for this project is currently at $210,600. Applicants in possession of assets exceeding this amount are not qualified for this project. (see attached asset inclusions and exclusions)
                *   Applicants owning real property within 100 miles of NYC are not eligible for an affordable unit.

  *   Documents:
                 *   For us to confirm household/income qualification, I will need the following documentation:

                                  *   One month's worth of most recent pay stubs for all family members
                                  *   Proof of any other income, such as child support, veterans‚Äô benefits, etc.
                                  *   1 Month bank statements
                                  *   Current lease
                                  *   ID‚Äôs, Birth Certificate, Social Security Cards

BRAND NEW rent stabilized 2 Bed/ 1 Bath for August 1st move in!!
